article.headline: Oakland, Mich. 78, UMKC 60
article.story: ROCHESTER, Mich. (AP) -- Erik Kangas shot 8-for-17 from 3-point range and finished with a career-high 28 points to lead Oakland past Missouri-Kansas City 78-60 on Saturday. Vova Severovas added 19 points and 10 rebounds to help the Golden Grizzlies improve to 12-9 overall and 5-0 in the Mid-Continent Conference. Brandon Cassise came off the bench to finish with 11 points and four assists. Dee Ayuba had a career-best 27 points for UMKC (7-14, 2-3) and Quinton Day added 16. The Kangaroos shot just 1-for-16 from 3-point range, were outrebounded 41-27 and went without a field goal for an eight-minute stretch.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
